author: atroughton
title: atroughton published ​This is how much you would have won if you backed Donald Trump,...
text:
​This is how much you would have won if you backed Donald Trump, Leicester City and Brexit treble By atroughton | Posted: November 09, 2016 0 COMMENTS SHARES How much you would've won if you backed Trump, City and Brexit ​This is how much you would have won if you backed Donald Trump, Leicester City... X 
Copy link to paste in your message / 
A punter who had the foresight to back a Donald Trump, Brexit and Leicester City treble would be set for a huge windfall today. 
We asked national betting comparison site Oddschecker how much the unlikely treble would have been worth. 
If a plucky punter had put just £5 on the bet – they would be set for well over £1.5 million. 
Ross Whent from Oddschecker said: "Following Donald Trump's win in the US election , there's been a lot of talk this morning about the value of a treble including Trump, Brexit and Leicester to win the Premier League . 
"Trump's win has continued the trend of shock results in 2016 but what was the true best-priced value of the treble when all markets were live? 
Read more: What is the biggest shock of 2016 – Donald Trump, Brexit or Leicester City? 
"In September 2015, the Premier League had just started, the EU referendum campaigns had just begun and the Republican and Democratic nominee campaigns were just getting off the ground. 
"Leicester had started the season in good form but no one really gave them a chance, with best odds of 5000/1. Leaving the EU seemed highly unlikely in a two horse race, with best odds of 4/1. Trump's campaign had started to build momentum having been 250/1 a year earlier and his best odds were 12/1. 
"Putting those three outcomes in a live accumulator would have paid a massive 325,065/1 . 
"They say hindsight is 20/20 vision but there will be plenty of people out there wishing they had put some money on this longest of long-shots now."
